  • Packages that use com.guardtime.envelope.verification.result 
    Package Description

    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature.ksi
    Implementation of KSI signature verification rules
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.result used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification 
    Class and Description
    ResultHolder
    Helper class for gathering and accessing RuleVerificationResults.
    RuleVerificationResult
    Results produced during verification which group together the rule VerificationResult and rule data (e.g.
    SignatureResult
    Contains an aggregate VerificationResult for signature verification as well as a signature type specific result for signature verification.
    VerificationResult
    Possible results for any given rule used to verify an envelope.
